collectionMetadata.name: Recidivism Rate
collectionMetadata.description: Recidivism rate is defined as the percentage of local offenders under the custody of the Singapore Prison Service, who were subsequently detained or sentenced to imprisonment or day reporting order within two years of release into the community. This definition has been applied to the 2018 release cohort onwards.

datasetMetadata.name: Recidivism Rate
datasetMetadata.description:
Recidivism rate is defined as the percentage of local offenders under the custody of the Singapore Prison Service, who were subsequently detained or sentenced to imprisonment or day reporting order within two years of release into the community. This definition has been applied to the 2018 release cohort onwards.

Data is updated as per end 2020, for the full 2 year 2018 release cohort.
